channel.title: Posts on Hi, I'm Jason Siu
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hi, I'm Jason Siu

item.title: THM: Chillhack CTF Writeup
item.description: Hello! Once again, today we have another CTF writeup, yet again. Today’s CTF will be Chillhack from TryHackMe, but despite the title, it’s anything but chill. It involves the use of multiple techniques, such as reverse shell, remote code execution bypassing, steganography, horizonal escalation, code analysis and more. It’s pretty involved. You can read my PDF writeup here. Thanks for reading, – Jason
item.content:
Hello!

Once again, today we have another CTF writeup, yet again.

Today’s CTF will be Chillhack from TryHackMe, but despite the title, it’s anything but chill.

It involves the use of multiple techniques, such as reverse shell, remote code execution bypassing, steganography, horizonal escalation, code analysis and more. It’s pretty involved.

You can read my PDF writeup here.

Thanks for reading, – Jason

item.title: THM: BoilerCTF Writeup
item.description: Hello everyone! Today’s post will be about a writeup that I made for BoilerCTF on TryHackMe. This is a medium level CTF, just due to the sheer amount of rabbit holes there are. The link to the CTF is here. You can read my PDF writeup here. I will make a video walkthrough on this CTF soon. Enjoy! – Jason
item.content:
Hello everyone!

Today’s post will be about a writeup that I made for BoilerCTF on TryHackMe.

This is a medium level CTF, just due to the sheer amount of rabbit holes there are.

The link to the CTF is here.

You can read my PDF writeup here.

I will make a video walkthrough on this CTF soon.

Enjoy!

– Jason

item.title: THM: Basic Pentesting CTF Writeup
item.description: Hello everyone! This is my first official writeup, I wanted to make it as similar to a real penetration test providing documentation in sections. Hope you enjoy reading. This writeup comes from a CTF called Basic Pentesting by ashu. You can view the PDF writeup here. – Jason
item.content:
Hello everyone!

This is my first official writeup, I wanted to make it as similar to a real penetration test providing documentation in sections. Hope you enjoy reading.

This writeup comes from a CTF called Basic Pentesting by ashu.

You can view the PDF writeup here.

– Jason
